titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Spiromesifen.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/5/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on 3,3-Dimethylbutanoic acid, 2-oxo-3-(2,4,6-trimethylphenyl)-1-oxaspiro[4.4]non-3-en-yl ester (Spiromesifen).
